edge: The 14th Zee Cine Awards recognized Kahaani as the Best Film (Critics) in addition to winning four other awards.

node_2: most entertaining film of the year
edge: The 3rd ceremony of the BIG Star Entertainment Awards recognized Kahaani as the Most Entertaining Film of the Year.

node_2: nominated for best film at 58th filmfare awards
edge: Kahaani was nominated for Best Film at the 58th Filmfare Awards.
The 58th Filmfare Awards recognized Ghosh with the award for Best Director for Ghosh.
Kahaani won the Best Actress award for Vidya Balan's performance at the 19th Colors Screen Awards.
Kahaani was awarded Best Actress (Critics) for Vidya Balan's performance at the 14th Zee Cine Awards.

node_2: best actress in a thriller or action
edge: Vidya Balan received the Best Actress in a Thriller or Action award for her performance in Kahaani at the 2013 Stardust Awards.
At the 60th National Film Awards, Namrata Rao won Best Editing for Kahaani.
At the 60th National Film Awards, Nawazuddin Siddiqui received a Special Jury award for his performance in Kahaani.
